text: I’ve been practicing at AHA Move for one session, and it has truly transformed my yoga journey. The instructors Jiaxin are incredibly knowledgeable and supportive, ensuring that each session is both challenging and restorative. The studio’s atmosphere is calming and welcoming, with Sing Bowl healing.

My go-to class is Yin Yoga & Soundbath with Jiaxin! Jiaxin is very patient in explaining the uses of different yoga poses and her calm demeanour makes the entire class very relaxing and peaceful. Definitely a class type I’d recommend for all students :) The studio is conveniently located, well-kept and clean, with many other class offerings, making it a convenient space for those who would like to practise yoga.

I am absolutely delighted with my experience at this yoga studio. The instructor Jia Xin is exceptional, offering not only comprehensive lessons but also sharing profound wisdom that enriches the mind and spirit. The serene atmosphere of the studio is perfectly complemented by sound healing sessions, creating a deeply relaxing and rejuvenating environment. This place is a hidden gem that you simply cannot miss!

Tried yoga & meditation with Instructor JiaXin for the first time.
She's generous and candid with her knowledge and sharing about meditation and wellness.
Not my first encounter (albeit first with AHA Move), we did meditation (sound bath-aided) and it's a great first wholesome experience for myself.
Will go back to try other categories.

Stumbled upon Aha Move studio by chance for sound healing & meditation session and yin yoga & meditation session. Spacious studio with calming vibes. Instructors are knowledgeable and attentive. Great space to quickly unwind after a hazardous day/week. Thank you thank you thank you.
